MCE: Modelling Community Transitions Across Coral Reef Depth Gradients

Source: R/MCE-package.R
MCE-package.Rd

This package contains functions which predict the vertical distributions of coral reef communities. The package is based on the mechanistic model of (Laverick et al., 2020) which uses water clarity and community level light preferences.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://jack-h-laverick.github.io/MCE/
